7C0903A6 4E800421
83E10008 80010010
7C0803A6 3821000C

Enable and disable Glider at will.

Online [O]
Offline [O]

- This only applies to the player with a Wii U Gamepad.
- This code is fully stable.

<A + D-Pad Up>
Enable

<A + D-Pad Down>
Disable

---

Source: https://pastebin.com/iBU7cSht

Is Raw Machine Code [O]
Is Assembly RAM Writes [X]
